articles.title: ‘He batted extremely well, well done to him’: Kagiso Rabada lauds Virat Kohli's patience in Cape Town knock - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Playing in his 50th Test, Rabada was outstanding with figures of 4/73 which included the prized scalp of India captain Virat Kohli (79). | Cricket
articles.content:
South Africa may have bowled India out for 223 in their first innings here but ace speedster Kagiso Rabada on Tuesday said their batters will have to dig deep to win the series-deciding third Test.

articles.title: vivo Pro Kabaddi League Season 8: Patna Pirates ease their way past U Mumba - Pro Kabaddi
articles.description: Patna Pirates beat U Mumba 43-23. Pirates’ Neeraj Kumar was his team’s top scorer with eight tackle points, while Abhishek led his team with eight raid points.
